message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can negotiate more later.
You're starting strong, I'll try to balance it out.
I appreciate the attempt to balance things, but I'm still willing to take a bit less than my initial offer. Let's try 80/20 this time.
You're not budging, I'll try to take a bigger share this time.
We're both getting a bit stubborn. Let's try 70/30.  This is probably the best we can do without risking losing everything.
